medicines.name: Paracetamol
medicines.details: calcium stearate or magnesium stearate, cellulose, docusate sodium and sodium benzoate or sodium lauryl sulfate, starch, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, propylene glycol, sodium starch glycolate, polyethylene glycol and Red #40.

medicines.name: Crocin
medicines.details: Crocin Pain Relief Tab contains paracetamol (650mg) and caffeine (50mg).
